DOC.brief_summary: The Evolution® Biliary Stent System Clinical Study is a clinical trial on a commercially available device to gather physician experience with the Cook Evolution® Biliary Stent System for the palliation of cancer in the biliary tree. Patients will be treated as per usual medical practices.
DOC.brief_title: Evolution® Biliary Stent System Clinical Study
DOC.criteria: Patient is considered a candidate for stent placement based on institutional guidelines and product IFU. Patient is less than 18 years of age. Patient is unable or unwilling to provide written informed consent. Patient is unable or unwilling to comply with the followup schedule.
